FuncDef: Use this command to define whether the TWAMP Light PDU packet should be treated as in-profile or out-of-profile. The default has been selected because the forwarding class defaults to best effort.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies that the TWAMP Light PDU packet will be sent as in-profile.
Specifies that the TWAMP Light PDU packet will be sent as out-of-profile.
